Package to.us.resume_builder.business.util

Class StringTemplate

java.lang.Object
to.us.resume_builder.business.util.StringTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class StringTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
This class encapsulates string formatting for easier passing of template parameters and arguments.
Author:
Matthew McCaskill

  • Field Summary

    Fields

    private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> replacements
    A Map of formatting keys to their values, to be replaces in the toString() method.
    private java.lang.String template
    The string template with formatting keys in the form.

  • Method Details

    • replaceVariable

      public StringTemplate replaceVariable​(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Set the value of a key in the template. If the key does not exist in the template, then this method is a no-op.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to replace.
      value - The value to set the key to.
      Returns:
      A reference to this StringTemplate, for method chaining.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Get the string representation of this template, with all keys replaced.

      Returns:
      The string representation of this template.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString​(java.lang.Runnable callback)
      Get the string representation of this template, with all keys replaced, then run the callback.
      Parameters:
      callback - A function to call once the string is generated.
      Returns:
      The string representation of this template.
